extendedInfo.description: Briscola is the popular Italian card game you commonly see played in the cafes of Italy. It is a fun, challenging and easy to learn game in which the trump, or briscola card changes for each game.Briscola Free features:* Download Modiano regional card decks* Easy to understand Italian card symbols* Face Up option to help learn* Help pageBuon Divertimento!

reviews.title: Brutto brutto
reviews.comment: Meriterebbe 0 stelle! Disegni fatti talmente male che non si possono guardare, soprattutto quello che dovrebbe essere un \"bastone\" sembra semplicemente una cacca! Come on!! Really!?
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: My favourite app
reviews.comment: Been using this app for 2 years. Briscola cards for different regions. Easy to play. Would like to have different levels of play. The possibility of playing against other people rather than computer would be great.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: I don\'t think the posted rules are correct.  When a suite is played, all others MUST follow suite unless you play a trump card or no suite card on han

reviews.title: Follows rules correctly
reviews.comment: In briscola you do not have to follow suite as you later do in hearts. Also you only need to be online to download a different deck.
